mapper.select: SELECT * FROM A_FUNDING WHERE FUNDING_STATUS IN ('Y','S')
mapper.update: UPDATE FUNDING_PROJECT SET FUNDING_START_DAY=#{fundingSD}, FUNDING_END_DAY=#{fundingED} WHERE FUNDING_ID=#{fundingNo}
UPDATE FUNDING_PROJECT SET FUNDING_STATUS='N' WHERE FUNDING_ID IN ( ${fundingNo} )
mapper.select: SELECT TO_DATE(SUBSTR( TO_CHAR (FUNDING_END_DAY, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), 1, 7), 'YYYY-MM') FUNDING_END_DAY, SUM(FEES) FEES FROM A_FUNDING WHERE SUBSTR( TO_CHAR(FUNDING_END_DAY, 'YYYY-MM-DD' ) , 3, 2) = #{yy} GROUP BY TO_DATE(SUBSTR( TO_CHAR (FUNDING_END_DAY, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), 1, 7), 'YYYY-MM') ORDER BY FUNDING_END_DAY

SELECT SUM(CATEGORY_SUM) CATEGORY_SUM ,CATEGORY_ID FROM( SELECT REWARD_PRICE * SUM(ORDER_REWARD_AMOUNT) CATEGORY_SUM ,CATEGORY_ID, REWARD_PRICE From FUNDING_PROJECT F LEFT JOIN ORDER_REWARD O ON (F.FUNDING_ID = O.FUNDING_ID) LEFT JOIN REWARD R ON (O.REWARD_ID = R.REWARD_ID) WHERE SUBSTR( TO_CHAR(FUNDING_END_DAY, 'YYYY-MM-DD' ) , 3, 5) = '20-10' GROUP BY CATEGORY_ID,REWARD_PRICE ) GROUP BY CATEGORY_ID
